siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.
blogPost.body: Meteostat is a meteorological database which provides historical weather and climate data for thousands of weather stations and places worldwide. The project features a convenient web app and data interfaces for developers.
blogPost.title: Meteostat - Historical weather and climate data
blogPost.author: Christian Lamprecht

localize.description: 气象站是一个气象数据库，提供全球数千个气象站和地点的历史天气和气候数据。该项目的特点是为开发人员提供了方便的Web应用程序和数据接口。
氣象站是一個氣象數據庫，提供全球數千個氣象站和地點的歷史天氣和氣候數據。該項目的特點是爲開發人員提供了方便的Web應用程序和數據接口。

previous.excerpt: The clean, uncomplicated lines of classic European sports coupes like the BMW 3-series and Alpha Romeo Giulia are something that's been sorely missing from EVs for at least a decade. This changes with Alpha's ACE.
previous.title: The Alpha Ace EV - An ideally sized personal vehicle with an electrifying soul.

localize.description: 像宝马3系和阿尔法·罗密欧·朱利亚(Alpha Romeo Giulia)这样的欧洲经典运动跑车干净、简单的线条，是电动汽车至少十年来严重缺失的东西。这一点随着阿尔法的ACE而改变。
localize.tagline: 一辆理想大小的私人汽车，有着令人兴奋的灵魂。

localize.description: 像寶馬3系和阿爾法·羅密歐·朱利亞(Alpha Romeo Giulia)這樣的歐洲經典運動跑車乾淨、簡單的線條，是電動汽車至少十年來嚴重缺失的東西。這一點隨着阿爾法的ACE而改變。
localize.tagline: 一輛理想大小的私人汽車，有着令人興奮的靈魂。

next.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
next.title: Referrer - Painlessly refer your friends for jobs

localize.description: 通过在你的网站上嵌入一个小工具来帮助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那里你可以把访问者引导到你的朋友那里，寻找你找不到的工作。在在线生成器中创建您的小部件，并使用IFRAME将其嵌入到您的网站上。就这么简单。
localize.tagline: 毫不费力地推荐你的朋友找工作

localize.description: 通過在你的網站上嵌入一個小工具來幫助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那裏你可以把訪問者引導到你的朋友那裏，尋找你找不到的工作。在在線生成器中創建您的小部件，並使用IFRAME將其嵌入到您的網站上。就這麼簡單。
localize.tagline: 毫不費力地推薦你的朋友找工作
